mdx:
<TextFormatter
	insertions={[
		{
			text: "{SOLO}",
			replacement: (
				<Tablature
					notes="Version del solo con punteo en vez de rasgueo"
					positions={[
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 5 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 6 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 7 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 6 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 6 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 7 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 7 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 5 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 5 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
					]}
				/>
			),
		},
	]}
>
	{DATA.song.parsedLyrics}
</TextFormatter>
